item.name: Hurricane Waterproof and Shockproof Case - Black (L275xW202xH148mm)
item.description:
Hurricane Waterproof and Shockproof Protective Black Case.

Keep your items safe from any impact or shock damage with high density cubed foam block inserts and an egg foam lid insert.

Perfect for DSLR Cameras, GoPro and other small to medium electronics

Cubed Foam, Egg Foam Lid inserts and Shoulder Carry Strap are included

Cases and Enclosures are suppliers of quality flight cases, hurricane cases and plastic enclosures for a wide range of uses and applications.
item.short_description:
IP67 Rated - Watertight, Airtight and Dustproof

IK08 Rated - Shock and Crushproof

Pressure Equalization Valve - Adjust internal air pressure

Chemical Resistant and Anti-Corrosive - Handles almost any environment

High Density Cubed Foam Layers - Ultimate protection for your items

Able to withstand full immersion in water up to 1m for up to 30 minutes

Temperature Range from -20 degreeC to 60 degreeC (Short Term -40 degreeC to 80 degreeC)

Secure Padlock Loops - Keep your items secure

item.description_SC:
Hurricane Waterproof and Shockproof Protective Black Case.

Keep your items safe from any impact or shock damage with high density cubed foam block inserts and an egg foam lid insert.

Perfect for Scientific samples, Measuring equipment including Calipers, Micrometers and Gauges to DSLR Cameras, GoPro and other small to medium electronics

Cubed Foam, Egg Foam Lid inserts and Shoulder Carry Strap are included

Cases and Enclosures are suppliers of quality flight cases, hurricane cases and plastic enclosures for a wide range of uses and applications.
item.short_description_SC:
IP67 Rated - Watertight, Airtight and Dustproof

IK08 Rated - Shock and Crushproof

Pressure Equalization Valve - Adjust internal air pressure

Chemical Resistant and Anti-Corrosive - Handles almost any environment

High Density Cubed Foam Layers - Ultimate protection for your items

Able to withstand full immersion in water up to 1m for up to 30 minutes

Temperature Range from -20 degreeC to 60 degreeC (Short Term -40 degreeC to 80 degreeC)

Secure Padlock Loops - Keep your items secure

item.name: ROC Cases Flight Carry Case with Foam and Carry Strap (L460 x W330 x H150mm)
item.description:
One of our best sellers, the A501 carry case is a medium sized flight case, supplied with a pre-cubed, pick & pluck foam block as standard. The foam is pre scored, allowing you to choose and easily pick out the required shapes to store, protect and display your items.

A shoulder strap is included, with egg crate foam supplied in the lid for further protection. 

With a smart silver & black design, this case is suitable for a variety of industries and uses.

High Density PE foam blocks are available as an optional extra, we can also quote for CNC foam cut to your requirements. Please contact us for more details.

item.name: Hurricane Waterproof and Shockproof Protective Case - Black (L453xW332.5xH307.5mm)
item.description:
Hurricane Waterproof and Shockproof Protective Black Case.

Keep your items safe from any impact or shock damage with high density cubed foam block inserts and an egg foam lid insert.

Perfect for Scientific, Testing and Measuring Equipment including Calipers, Gauges and Readouts as well as DSLR Camera and Video Camera Equipment and other medium electronics

Cubed Foam, Egg Foam Lid inserts and Shoulder Carry Strap are included

Cases and Enclosures are suppliers of quality flight cases, hurricane cases and plastic enclosures for a wide range of uses and applications.
item.short_description:
IP67 Rated - Watertight, Airtight and Dustproof

IK08 Rated - Shock and Crushproof

Pressure Equalization Valve - Adjust internal air pressure

Chemical Resistant and Anti-Corrosive - Handles almost any environment

High Density Cubed Foam Layers - Ultimate protection for your items

Able to withstand full immersion in water up to 1m for up to 30 minutes

Temperature Range from -20 degreeC to 60 degreeC (Short Term -40 degreeC to 80 degreeC)

Secure Padlock Loops - Keep your items secure

item.name: Cases and Enclosures Flight Case Combination Padlock
item.description:
A combination padlock designed to fit our range of aluminium flight cases and Hurricane Equipment Cases, only if they have padlock loop latches. The lock is also ideal for gym and school lockers, backpacks/ rucksacks, toolboxes, suitcases, luggage, cupboards/ cabinets, tents, and more.

To operate please follow the below:

- Turn the Hasp 90 degrees so that that pip locates into the slot.

- Select a number.

- Push down on the Hasp until it locks into place.

item.Product_Bullet6: Lock has a keyring loop for convenient transportation

item.name: Resettable Combination Padlock for Flight Case
item.description:
A combination padlock designed to fit our range of aluminium flight cases and Hurricane Equipment Cases, only if they have padlock loop latches. The lock is also ideal for gym and school lockers, backpacks/ rucksacks, toolboxes, suitcases, luggage, cupboards/ cabinets, tents, and more.

To operate please follow the below:

- Turn the Hasp 90 degrees so that that pip locates into the slot.

- Select a number.

- Push down on the Hasp until it locks into place.
item.short_description: Resettable Combination Padlock for Flight Case

item.Product_Bullet4: Simply rotate the arm 90 degrees and press down, whilst pressing down simply change the lock to your desired combination then release
item.Product_Bullet5: The combination can be changed as many times and as frequently as you like
item.Product_Bullet6: Lock has a keyring loop for convenient transportation

item.name: 10 Litre Digital Cavitek Heated Ultrasonic Cleaner - 40kHz
item.description: Our premium range of Ultrasonic cleaners, the 10 litre Cavitek has 200 watts of ultrasonic power and operates at a frequency of 40kHz. This Cavitek range benefits from a number of features: 400 watt thermostatically heated tank, timer, degas mode, delicate mode through to full power mode for those stubborn items. These features lead to greater control of the cleaning process than that offered by other models.
item.short_description: 10 litre 40kHz digital Cavitek ultrasonic cleaner with thermostatically heated bath, long and narrow tank for those slimmer items such as surgical and medical instruments. Power supply: 220V/AC 50Hz. 200 Watts Ultrasonic power 40kHz.
item.Product_Bullet1: 10 Litre heated ultrasonic cleaner (to brim capacity).
item.Product_Bullet2: Removes dirt, grease, corrosion and other contaminants. For best results use with Allendale's specially formulated ultrasonic cleaning detergents.
item.Product_Bullet3: Machine and lid constructed from anti-corrosive, acid proof SUS304 stainless steel for maximum durability - tank pressed from a single sheet.
item.Product_Bullet4: Tactile buttons for mode adjustments, timer and temperature control.
item.Product_Bullet5: Degas mode for preparation of cleaning solutions.
item.Product_Bullet6: Delicate and full power modes for greater control of the cleaning process.
item.Product_Bullet7: 40 kHz operating frequency (alternative frequencies available).
item.Product_Bullet8: 200 Watts ultrasonic power.
item.Product_Bullet11: Drain tap (Standard  BSP pipe thread).
item.Product_Bullet12: Tank size - (L) 505 x (W) 135 x (H) 150mm.
item.Product_Bullet13: Machine size - (L)550 x (W)165 x (H)310 mm (exc. Drain tap).

item.name: Concentrated Carburettor Cleaning Fluid - 1000 Litre IBC
item.description: Intermediate bulk container of specially formulated carburettor & engine cleaning solution. Ideal for large scale commercial users that require a greater volume of detergent. This is an alkaline based detergent that works well on all engine parts. Suitable for: marine, automotive, construction and agricultural engines and machinery as well as workshop applications.
item.short_description: 1000L IBC of concentrated carburettor cleaning detergent, designed specifically for carburettors and other engine parts. Also suitable for engineering, machinery and many other industrial applications.
item.Product_Bullet1: 1000 Litre container.
item.Product_Bullet2: Our special formulation for cleaning engine and machine parts in ultrasonic cleaners.
item.Product_Bullet3: Safely removes contaminates such as carbon, grease, oil and general soiling from components.
item.Product_Bullet4: The concentrate solution is added to water at a rate of 1 part concentrate to 10 parts of water (we recommend using deionised / de-mineralized water)
item.Product_Bullet5: Ideal operating temperature 50-80 degreesC.
item.Product_Bullet6: Safe to use on most metal, always test detergent on new applications before fully submerging in solution.
item.Product_Bullet7: Rinse thoroughly once removed from solution.
item.Product_Bullet8: Applications include: carburettors, valves, cylinder heads, rockers, seats and many other engine parts.
item.Product_Bullet9: Suitable for mechanical, engineering, machining, laboratory and other industrial and domestic uses.

item.name: Aoyue 9070 5 Litre Ultrasonic Cleaner for Circuit Boards
item.description:
The Aoyue 9070 is an advanced high power ultrasonic cleaning system which incorporates the latest technologies including sweeping frequencies to allow efficient and effective cleaning in the shortest amount of time.  The digital control panel also the choice of 5 different modes.
 
The square stainless steel tanks is specially suitable for cleaning oversized items such as PCBs, Metal plates, boards and other objects with a large surface area.  This will fit the Xbox 360, Xbox One, PS3 and PS4 Boards.  There is an adjustable holding wire system to control the depth in the tank.
This product is now discontinued, Please see US-CU-CA-20L.
item.short_description:
Aoyue 9070 5L Ultrasonic Cleaner for Circuit Boards - large tank size makes it ideal for large PCB boards like Xbox One, Xbox 360, PS3, PS4

This product is now discontinued, Please see US-CU-CA-20L.

item.Product_Bullet3: Sweep frequency feature, eliminates damages to sensitive components by continuously varying the operating frequency from 25 to 28Khz or 28 to 30Khz
item.Product_Bullet4: Auto-load following feature, allows the system to automatically adjust the cleaning power depending on load conditions
item.Product_Bullet5: Power control feature, adjust cleaning power from 60 to 100 percent to cater to various cleaning requirements

item.name: Professional 3 Litre Digital Cavitek Ultrasonic Cleaner Tank with Heated Bath -220V
item.description:
An ultrasonic cleaner provides a means of cleaning a wide range of objects. The unique qualities of using this technology are:

The item being cleaned is not subjected to harsh abrasive or scrubbing actions and dangerous chemicals.
The cleaning action reaches to all inaccessible and intricate details of items such as the insides of tubes and threads etc.
The machine allows for 'switch on and leave' cleaning saving valuable time for the user.

Underneath the cleaning reservoir are a number of transducers which generate ultrasound waves at a frequency of 40KHz. These sound waves cause millions of minute bubbles to continuously form in the tank and then collapse. This process is known as cavitation. The force of these bubbles collapsing against an object placed into the tank provides a gentle and thorough cleaning action.

Allendale Ultrasonics strive to provide specialist and affordable ultrasonic Cleaner equipment, our ultrasonic Cleaner tanks and fluids can be used for many applications. Including mechanics, engineering workshops, machinists, factories, hospitals, dental practices, surgeries, general practices (GPs), doctors, veterinarian, vets, laboratories, marine work, tattoo studios, body piercing parlors, labs, universities, PCB boards, soldering, scuba diving schools, gardeners, tree surgeons, jewellers, watch repair, acupuncture, hairdressers, kitchens, restaurants, bars, hotels, cafes, hobbyists, industrial, printers, coin collectors, and more.

item.name: Professional 6 Litre Digital Cavitek Ultrasonic Cleaner Tank with Heated Bath -220V
item.description:
A guide to ultrasonic Cleaner:

An ultrasonic cleaner provides a means of cleaning a wide range of objects. The unique qualities of using this technology are:

The item being cleaned is not subjected to harsh abrasive or scrubbing actions and dangerous chemicals.
The cleaning action reaches to all inaccessible and intricate details of items such as the insides of tubes and threads etc.
The machine allows for 'switch on and leave' cleaning saving valuable time for the user.

Underneath the cleaning reservoir are a number of transducers which generate ultrasound waves at a frequency of 40KHz. These sound waves cause millions of minute bubbles to continuously form in the tank and then collapse. This process is known as cavitation. The force of these bubbles collapsing against an object placed into the tank provides a gentle and thorough cleaning action.

Allendale Ultrasonics strive to provide specialist and affordable ultrasonic cleaning equipment, our ultrasonic cleaning tanks and fluids can be used for many applications. Including mechanics, engineering workshops, machinists, factories, hospitals, dental practices, surgeries, general practices (GPs), doctors, veterinarian, vets, laboratories, marine work, tattoo studios, body piercing parlors, labs, universities, PCB boards, soldering, scuba diving schools, gardeners, tree surgeons, jewellers, watch repair, acupuncture, hairdressers, kitchens, restaurants, bars, hotels, cafes, hobbyists, industrial, printers, coin collectors, and more.

item.Product_Bullet3: The Cavitek series offers increased functionality with features such as degas, delicate and full power modes alongside the standard fluid temperature and cleaning cycle timer controls
item.Product_Bullet4: For best results use appropriate cleaning fluid or solvent suitable for the item

item.name: Carburettor, Machine, and Engine Parts Ultrasonic Cleaner Solution - 25 Litre Cleaning Fluid
item.description: Allendale Ultrasonics strive to provide specialist and affordable ultrasonic Cleaner equipment, our ultrasonic Cleaner tanks and carburettor cleaning fluids can be used for many applications. Including Engines, engine components, heads, valves, seats, rockers, carburettors, mechanics, engineering workshops, machinists, factories, laboratories, hobbyists, industrial, and more
item.short_description: A concentrated ultrasonic Cleaner fluid designed in the UK to clean carburettors and engine parts, also machine parts and metal units
item.Product_Bullet1: A specialist formulation for adding to Ultrasonic baths for cleaning engine parts including carburetors, valves, heat exchangers etc
item.Product_Bullet2: It safely removes contaminants including general soiling, carbon and grease etc
item.Product_Bullet3: The cleaning process will not damage, corrode or darken metal components. Safe on brass, aluminium and other sensitive metals
item.Product_Bullet4: The concentrate solution is added to water at a rate of 1 part concentrate to 10 parts of water (we recommend using deionised / de-mineralized water)
item.Product_Bullet5: Operating temperature of bath should be set between 50 - 80 degrees centigrade
item.Product_Bullet6: Always test before use on new applications
item.Product_Bullet7: After cleaning rinse all surfaces thoroughly with clean water. The bath should be changed regularly when the solution becomes dirty
item.Product_Bullet8: Deep clean - Ideal for stain removal and removing dirt and oxidation
item.Product_Bullet9: Safe to use on most metals, although please test before use
item.Product_Bullet10: Designed for industrial professional use and hobbyist use - see other listings US-SO-CAR-1L and US-SO-CAR-5L

item.name: General Purpose Concentrated Ultrasonic Cleaner Solution - 5 Litre Cleaning Fluid
item.description: Allendale Ultrasonics strive to provide specialist and affordable ultrasonic Cleaner equipment, our ultrasonic Cleaner tanks and cleaning fluids can be used for many applications. Applications include mechanics, engineering workshops, machinists, factories, hospitals, dental practices, surgeries, general practices (GPs), doctors, veterinarian, vets, laboratories, marine work, tattoo studios, body piercing parlors, labs, universities, soldering, gardeners, tree surgeons, jewellers, watch repair, acupuncture, hairdressers, kitchens, restaurants, bars, hotels, cafes, hobbyists, industrial, printers, coin collectors, and more.
item.short_description: A concentrated ultrasonic Cleaner fluid designed in the UK to clean assist the ultrasonic cleaning process, ideal for use on a wide range of materials including plastics, metals, glass, and more.
item.Product_Bullet1: A concentrated, non hazardous, low alkaline cleaner, formulated in the UK to improve the cleaning process of ultrasonic cleaners
item.Product_Bullet2: Designed to remove oils, greases, dust and dirt contamination from mixed metals, plastics, rubber, ceramic and glass components
item.Product_Bullet3: Concentrate is added to water at a ratio 1 part concentrate, to between 5 and 20 parts water dependant on cleaning action required (We recommend using deionised / demineralised water).
item.Product_Bullet4: Operating temperature of bath should be set between 40 - 70 degrees centigrade
item.Product_Bullet5: Always test before use on new applications
item.Product_Bullet6: After cleaning rinse all surfaces thoroughly with clean water. The bath should be changed regularly when the solution becomes dirty
item.Product_Bullet7: Deep clean - Ideal for stain removal and removing dirt and oxidation
item.Product_Bullet8: Safe to use on many materials, although please test or contact us before use
item.Product_Bullet9: Designed for industrial professional use and hobbyist use - see other listings US-SO-ULT-1L

item.name: Carburettor, Machine, and Engine Parts Ultrasonic Cleaner Solution - 5 Litre Cleaning Fluid
item.description: Allendale Ultrasonics strive to provide specialist and affordable ultrasonic Cleaner equipment, our ultrasonic Cleaner tanks and carburettor cleaning fluids can be used for many applications. Including Engines, engine components, heads, valves, seats, rockers, carburettors, mechanics, engineering workshops, machinists, factories, laboratories, hobbyists, industrial, and more.
item.short_description: A concentrated ultrasonic Cleaner fluid designed in the UK to clean carburettors and engine parts, also machine parts and metal units.
item.Product_Bullet1: A specialist formulation for adding to Ultrasonic baths for cleaning engine parts including carburetors, valves, heat exchangers etc
item.Product_Bullet2: It safely removes contaminants including general soiling, carbon and grease etc
item.Product_Bullet3: The cleaning process will not damage, corrode or darken metal components. Safe on brass, aluminium and other sensitive metals
item.Product_Bullet4: The concentrate solution is added to water at a rate of 1 part concentrate to 10 parts of water (we recommend using deionised / de-mineralized water)
item.Product_Bullet5: Operating temperature of bath should be set between 50 - 80 degrees centigrade
item.Product_Bullet6: Always test before use on new applications
item.Product_Bullet7: After cleaning rinse all surfaces thoroughly with clean water. The bath should be changed regularly when the solution becomes dirty
item.Product_Bullet8: Deep clean - Ideal for stain removal and removing dirt and oxidation
item.Product_Bullet9: Safe to use on most metals, although please test before use
item.Product_Bullet10: Designed for industrial professional use and hobbyist use - see other listings US-SO-CAR-1L and US-SO-CAR-25L
item.Amazon_Title: Allendale Ultrasonics US-SO-CAR-5L 5 Litre Carburettor, Machine & Engine Parts Ultrasonic Cleaning Fluid Solution Cleaner Detergent Degreaser Dirt Remover

item.description: Combining a Tool Box with a Flight Case, the D001 case offers a smart and unique design with 2 pull out, sliding drawers. Ideal for storing hand tools, power tools, electronics, fishing gear, DIY equipment, hair and beauty products and much, much more!

item.name: Calculated Industries Machinist Calc Pro International
item.description: Engineers Calculator - Advanced Machining Math and Reference Tool
item.short_description: Engineers Calculator - Advanced Machining Math and Reference Tool
item.Product_Bullet1: Speeds and Feeds - Easily calculates your spindle speed RPM and feed rate (IPM) values
item.Product_Bullet2: Trigonometric Functions - Sine, Cosine, Tangent, Arcsine, Arcosine and Arctangent
item.Product_Bullet3: Right Triangle Math - Solves sine bar angle or any calculations involving unknown sides or angles. Easily converts between X-Y and polar co-ordinates
item.Product_Bullet4: Work in and convert between Metric and U.S. Units - Metres, centimetres, millimetres, feet, inches, fractions and mils. Tons, grams, kilograms, metric tonnes and pounds
item.Product_Bullet5: Works as a standard math calculator - +, -, +/-, %, 1/x, Pi, square root with memory and auto shut off
item.Product_Bullet6: Bolt Pattern - Easily calculates centre to centre chord lengths and all your x-y co-ordinates for any diameter circle or number of bolts from any start point (centred, rotated or x-y offsets)
item.Product_Bullet7: Thread sizes - Finds the tap or rod sizes of entered numeric, fractional or metric threads for any percent thread grip. Also provides the pitch, major and minor diameters for the specified class, grade and type
item.Product_Bullet8: Drill Point - Find the drill point cut depth for any cutting angle and drill size
item.Product_Bullet9: Drill Size - Gives you the closest fitting drill size for any hole diameter; plus scrolls up/down drill chart through all numeric, letter and metric sizes
item.Product_Bullet10: Included with the calculator is a rugged, shock, dust and moisture resistant Armadillo Gear case. Long life batteries (Two LR44), Quick Reference Guide and Easy to follow users guide
item.Product_Bullet11: Size - 160mm x 90mm x 25mm. (6.25" x 3.5" x 0.9") with Armadillo Gear case
item.Product_Bullet12: Power - Two 1.5V (LR44/A76) Long Life Batteries
item.Product_Bullet13: Display - 12 Digits (8 normal, 4 fractions) with full Annunciators

item.name: 2 Axis Bridgeport 42 Table Mill Digital Readout DRO Kit - Magnetic Encoders (Mill not included)
item.description: We offer an extensive range of Digital Readout equipment from most of the major manufacturers. This allows the most suitable options of consoles and encoders to be selected; based on functionality, price, and available mounting space. Both linear and rotary encoders are available in a variety of compact profile options. We stock a large range of adaptor cables and interfaces to allow simple replacement of damaged/faulty existing equipment for most manufacturers. A PC based DRO interface and axis summing interfaces are also available. Please feel free to contact our technical staff for further advice, or to arrange an on-site install by one of our engineers.
item.short_description: Mill not included. DRO kit only. The M-DRO 2 axis DRO kit custom-designed to fit onto the original Bridgeport turret milling machine. A specific kit with CNC machined brackets and step by step, full-colour install guide to assist with the installation. The mill must have the spot faced threaded holes on the left side of the knee, for the Y-axis encoder mounting plate. Suitable for the 42 inch table.
item.Product_Bullet1: 2 axis DRO kit designed to fit onto the Bridgeport milling machine with 42 inch table
item.Product_Bullet2: The machine must have the spot faced fixings in the side of the knee to fix the Y axis encoder.
item.Product_Bullet3: High quality CNC machined encoder brackets with all the required bolts and fixings supplied
item.Product_Bullet4: High precision 5 micron resolution magnetic encoders on both the longitudinal and cross travel (higher resolution upgrades are available, please contact us)
item.Product_Bullet5: A robust non contact system with the encoder being fully sealed to IP67 and flexible armoured cable
item.Product_Bullet6: Supplied with the M-DRO MDC700 2 axis mill console offering a high performance console with dedicated milling and drilling functions
item.Product_Bullet7: Functions include; mm/inch, PCD, line of holes, 200 SDM zero memory, arc contouring and incline milling
item.Product_Bullet8: The console features a sturdy die cast metal housing, which offers a very solid feel compared to plastic cased models
item.Product_Bullet9: User friendly front panel layout with dedicated zero key for each axis and clearly identifiable function keys
item.Product_Bullet10: UK written user manual and full colour, step by step install guides
item.Product_Bullet11: 2 year warranty and full technical support by our team of engineers

item.description_SC: Machine-DRO History - A division of The Allendale Group, a family run British company founded in 2003. Our roots are firmly based in the UK, with a head office, engineering and inspection department at our works in Hoddesdon, Hertfordshire. We pride ourselves on being a measuring tool specialists offering tools, services, advice and expertise to our end customers and international distributor network.
